posts.post_content: This is good. Give him a [Wispersilk Cloak](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wispersilk Cloak) and have some of those awesome [Myr](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Myr) out, and it's Milling time. Also, really good with [Accorder's Shield](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Accorder's Shield). For more shenanigans, play with [Tainted Stike](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tainted Stike) or [Argentum Armor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Argentum Armor).
